author: golddragon0507
content:
Hello, everyone!
This is Jackson from Canada.
I'm a dedicated Blockchain / Web developer with extensive experience in building chains using Cosmos SDK and writing smart contracts using Rust/Cosmwasm. I have proven expertise in developing complex technology-based systems for businesses, along with significant experience in full-stack and frontend development. My skills with Cosmos SDK, Golang, Rust, Cosmwasm, and Solidity make me an excellent candidate for any Blockchain/Web engineering position. 
I have worked on various projects that include building token bridge chains and NFT marketplaces, developed token and DEX platforms, built protocols for private smart contract programming using Rust and Web3 APIs, and more. I am highly knowledgeable in network, concurrent, and distributed programming/debugging, and has experience shipping commercial products with Intel SGX. 
I hold a Bachelor of Computer Science from the University of Manitoba and is fluent in both English and Japanese. I am an excellent communicator and problem-solver, with a passionate commitment to creating solutions that align with human values. I would be an asset to any team looking for a skilled and experienced Blockchain/Web developer.
If you interested,  please DM me.
Have a nice day!
